The video was published on August 9: 2019, and shows a group of men dressed in women's attire dancing to a Sinhala-language song, while a group of people wearing green t-shirts looks on and cheer.
The post has been viewed over 135: 000 times and shared more than 3,200 times.
The Sinhala: language caption translates to "Here's the real UNP. Real transsexuals... behold the butterfly government."
The video was not filmed at a UNP rally: but rather at a workplace for a local television program called Lunch Time TV, as confirmed by a comment from a Facebook user and evidence from the program's official Facebook page.
